text: Polyrhaphis angustata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Buquet in 1853. It is known from Colombia, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, French Guiana, Brazil, Panama, Ecuador, and Peru.BioLib.cz - Polyrhaphis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1853
title: Polyrhaphis angustata
